chunk_text:
#### Is hard alcohol allowed? You may use your take out bottle discount if you are the person
purchasing all of the wine. #### If I am a WHV WIne Club Member, can I get a special wine discount? Yes. An onsite venue manager is available for service. This includes
consultations (meetings/email/phone), event and vendor oversight, coordination of rehearsal time, set up, clean up, WHV rentals, vendor approval, parking and general event management. WHV is not your wedding day coordinator.
